meanings.definition: One of a thousand equal parts.
meanings.sent1: She divided the cake into thousandths to share with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for adding sugar in thousandths of a cup.
meanings.sent3: The ants worked together to carry the crumb, each claiming their thousandths.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, each fish seemed like a thousandths in a grand mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The starlit sky was a canvas of a thousandths, each twinkling light a piece of the whole.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number of one thousand in a series.
meanings.sent1: She was the thousandths person to cross the finish line in the race.
meanings.sent2: The library had a collection of books, with hers being the thousandths in line.
meanings.sent3: Being the thousandths in line for ice cream meant she had to wait a while.
meanings.sent4: The thousandths student to enter the classroom found the last seat available.
meanings.sent5: His thousandths attempt at solving the puzzle finally led to success.
